column2: @cjwingyorks You have my empathy, it's so hard. I was diagnosed 04, but am managing to keep smiling & I hope it rubs off on others :) xx
Tweet number 1 I was diagnosed with #ME in 2004 and fighting back is #exhausting, but I'm collecting #tinytriumphs evert day #mecfs
Got to read my record today. Apparently I am diagnosed with BOTH BPD and schizoid personality disorder ... What an odd mix ...
@HealingFromBPD I'm struggling to get MH therapy of any kind in my area. What can I do? I was diagnosed 4yrs ago and still not had treatment
@IamCarrieeeeee I am diagnosed bpd but im on meds for bipolar which are working. They still say its bpd eventhough bipolar meds work.
One year ago today... - I was diagnosed with BPD, it doesn‚Äôt really feel like a year, and although my... http://t.co/XkQfA0yB
As soon as I was diagnosed with Borderline Personality Disorder, I felt like I didn‚Äôt have the right to... http://tumblr.com/xs72a7rqyn
@SickLittleDoll http://t.co/K1Aol9Ux3J I was diagnosed but i don't see it most the time... Anyhow hope this helps =]
@Lizzi03 I guess I've had it for most my life, I was diagnosed 18months ago. Went to hospital for a bit but am now on the mend
@ellemacdonald82 I try not to get into a debate with myself about it. I was diagnosed with BPD, I manage it daily and believe I can thrive.
@thelifeofhannah I was diagnosed with anxiety&depression at 18 and I've just been diagnosed with BPD at 35 üôá
How long has everyone been diagnosed?  I was diagnosed in 2002 with Bipolar and BPD as a teen. bee
I've been tweeting about issues from the past -- before I was diagnosed with #BPD but was definitely suffering from it.
Book I read LONG before I was diagnosed with #BPD that gave me the hunch that I may have had it. And I did: http://t.co/VbrcZPuztv
fuck fuckity fuck! woken up to highschool games.  seriously I was diagnosed wrong, I am not bipolar my reactions are due to the fucktards
Seriously I think I was diagnosed wrong. I do not have bipolar; I'm just surrounded by asshat douche canoe fucktards!!
Since I was diagnosed at 17, does that mean my diagnoses aren't really on my medical records? #MentalIllness
@nonBPDspouse I was diagnosed 7 years ago & just accepted it 2 months ago. It takes time. We are a constant work in progress.
I don't believe I'll ever get better. I feel like I keep falling into the same hole. I was diagnosed 7 years ago. #SelfStigma #BPDchat
It's hard to believe that it's been 2 years since I was diagnosed with BPII and BPD.  I certainly have come a long way, that's for sure.
how many people are misdiagnosed as having bipolar, depression etc and are really borderline.  I was diagnosed as bipolar for 15 yrs
@Clairey_Love I was diagnosed about a year ago. ... still trying to understand it all myself. Very challenging.
@EssenceHappens I was diagnosed as bipolar from 20 until 38.. then at 39 Different Dr. Diagnosed me as borderline finally makes sense
Hi guys, this is my new blog! I was diagnosed BPD at 18, now, early 30's ;-) I've done DBT, currently struggling with substance misuse
@Coeliac_UK Jeez, I was diagnosed in 2008 and no one ever said anything about annual follow-ups.
@BorderlineBelle I wish I was diagnosed / got help young
@mydbtjourney I was diagnosed in November but struggling my whole life too. Refused to accept it till a month? Ago. Just started #dbt group
@ajmahari #bpdchat I was diagnosed a little over a year ago. I still struggle with self-harm...
@BipolarGirl82 Would LOVE 2 get 2 a point where I'm managing well, seems like it hasn't happened since I was diagnosed...trying 2 live here!
@fuckitallidk I was diagnosed last year
@BeautifullyBPD I didnt, I was diagnosed bipolar n I kept feelin worse n meds werent helpin. 4therapist later I heard bpd for the first time
Just realised been a year since I was diagnosed with BPD! Gone fast and looking back I feel proud of myself how I've come quite a long way
@BPDFFS before I was diagnosed a mental health nurse called me manipulative because I was having an emotional crisis and looking for help
When I was diagnosed I was relieved. I finally knew what was wrong and knew how to help myself. For the first... http://t.co/BWEQtcVVxK
@SmileyPeanuts @swanners1 @pinguinokx I was diagnosed w/ BPD, but I think there's some anxiety issue there, 2. So, a mental health blog? :)
My dad was diagnosed with bpd before I was born, but didn't tell me 'til 2008. I was diagnosed in 2006.
@KittyCosmicLove @insight_seeker me too,I was diagnosed with only MDD for years, I do have it but, the other symptoms were not accounted for
@Abellamena I know how that feels, at least I know what it is now, before I was diagnosed with BPD I had no idea
Video: Lol me in high school before I was diagnosed with Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD) http://t.co/oHEBhkJLGS
@CarlDunnJr @onyxbpd @hautefiasco I was diagnosed at 15 w/#BipolarDisorder and #BPD
@BorderlineBelle I was diagnosed last year so it's all fairly new to me. Thank you for caring. Xxxxx
@RobinTetley I was diagnosed 2 years ago but like you, struggled all my life. We have loads of learning to do I think ‚ù§Ô∏è
I told a boyfriend that I was diagnosed with BPD... He googled it & never trusted me again. I am so terrified of ever telling anyone. #bpd
My experience with cancer after I was diagnosed on my 16th birthday: http://t.co/lSvm0ypk8G #health #mentalhealth
@KarolineTGover It made a difference for me after I was diagnosed with borderline personality disorder-I felt proud and strong every day.
Its been 10 yrs since I was diagnosed wt BPD and there is still so much to be learned about BPD for myself and out there.
when did you first know you were legitimately depress... ‚Äî I was diagnosed when I was thirteen. If you think you... http://t.co/vVvnCqdhJe
@t0m0_steven Therapists have been telling me I had narcissistic traits for years, but recently I was diagnosed with NPD besides BPD
@HealingFromBPD I'm 22 now and I was diagnosed when I was 20
I was diagnosed with #agoraphobia almost 10 years ago. Are you familiar with this disorder? Read about it here ~ http://t.co/xBPxgMGu
@HealingFromBPD I'm 21 n I was diagnosed with bpd a month after I turned 21 in November 2014
7 months today since I was diagnosed with BPD. Zero support so far. Still waiting! #mentalhealth #BPD #howmuchlonger?
@rach06ao had not heard of #bpd before I was diagnosed. But I fit the bill. All 9 criteria.
@Glass1ncision Me too. I was diagnosed bipolar for like 4 years. When I was hospitalized this last november, they properly diagnosed me BPD
